verses.verse: וַיְכֻלּ֛וּ <S%H3615><s%> were finished הַשָּׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> Thus the heavens וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the earth וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all צְבָאָֽם׃ <S%H6635><s%> and all the host of them

וַיְכַ֤ל <S%H3615><s%> ended אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> God בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> And on the seventh מְלַאכְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4399><s%> his work אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> which he had made וַיִּשְׁבֹּת֙ <S%H7673><s%> and he rested בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> on the seventh מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְלַאכְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4399><s%> from all his work אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> which he had made

וַיְבָ֤רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> blessed אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> the seventh וַיְקַדֵּ֖שׁ <S%H6942><s%> and sanctified אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> it because ב֤וֹ שָׁבַת֙ <S%H7673><s%> that in it he had rested מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְלַאכְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4399><s%> from all his work אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בָּרָ֥א <S%H1254><s%> created אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> which God לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> and made פ

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These תוֹלְד֧וֹת <S%H8435><s%> [are] the generations הַשָּׁמַ֛יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heavens וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and of the earth בְּהִבָּֽרְאָ֑ם <S%H1254><s%> when they were created בְּי֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day עֲשׂ֛וֹת <S%H6213><s%> made יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְשָׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> and the heavens

וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> and every שִׂ֣יחַ <S%H7880><s%> And every plant הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field טֶ֚רֶם <S%H2962><s%> before יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become בָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> it was in the earth וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every עֵ֥שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> and every herb הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field טֶ֣רֶם <S%H2962><s%> before יִצְמָ֑ח <S%H6779><s%> it grew כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> had not הִמְטִ֜יר <S%H4305><s%> caused it to rain יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth וְאָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> a man אַ֔יִן <S%H369><s%> and [there was] not לַֽעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> to till אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> the ground

וְאֵ֖ד <S%H108><s%> a mist יַֽעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> But there went up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְהִשְׁקָ֖ה <S%H8248><s%> and watered אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole פְּנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> the whole face הָֽאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> of the ground

וַיִּיצֶר֩ <S%H3335><s%> formed יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> man עָפָר֙ <S%H6083><s%> [of] the dust מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> of הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> the ground וַיִּפַּ֥ח <S%H5301><s%> and breathed בְּאַפָּ֖יו <S%H639><s%> into his nostrils נִשְׁמַ֣ת <S%H5397><s%> the breath חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> of life וַֽיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> became הָֽאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> and man לְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> soul חַיָּֽה׃ <S%H2416><s%> became a living

וַיִּטַּ֞ע <S%H5193><s%> planted יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> God גַּן־ <S%H1588><s%> a garden בְעֵ֖דֶן <S%H5731><s%> in Eden מִקֶּ֑דֶם <S%H6924><s%> eastward וַיָּ֣שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> he put שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> and there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> the man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom יָצָֽר׃ <S%H3335><s%> he had formed

וַיַּצְמַ֞ח <S%H6779><s%> to grow יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> God מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> And out הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> of the ground כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֵ֛ץ <S%H6086><s%> every tree נֶחְמָ֥ד <S%H2530><s%> that is pleasant לְמַרְאֶ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> to the sight וְט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> and good לְמַאֲכָ֑ל <S%H3978><s%> for food וְעֵ֤ץ <S%H6086><s%> the tree הַֽחַיִּים֙ <S%H2416><s%> of life בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> also in the midst הַגָּ֔ן <S%H1588><s%> of the garden וְעֵ֕ץ <S%H6086><s%> and the tree הַדַּ֖עַת <S%H1847><s%> of knowledge ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> of good וָרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> and evil

וְנָהָרּ֙ <S%H5104><s%> And a river יֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> went out מֵעֵ֔דֶן <S%H5731><s%> of Eden לְהַשְׁק֖וֹת <S%H8248><s%> to water אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגָּ֑ן <S%H1588><s%> the garden וּמִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there יִפָּרֵ֔ד <S%H6504><s%> and from thence it was parted וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> and became לְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> and became into four רָאשִֽׁים׃ <S%H7218><s%> heads

שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> The name הָֽאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> of the first פִּישׁ֑וֹן <S%H6376><s%> [is] Pison ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> that הַסֹּבֵ֗ב <S%H5437><s%> [is] it which compasseth אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the whole land הַֽחֲוִילָ֔ה <S%H2341><s%> of Havilah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> where שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there הַזָּהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> [there is] gold

וּֽזֲהַ֛ב <S%H2091><s%> And the gold הָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> of that ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] good שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> are there הַבְּדֹ֖לַח <S%H916><s%> there [is] bdellium וְאֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> stone הַשֹּֽׁהַם׃ <S%H7718><s%> and the onyx

וְשֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> And the name הַנָּהָ֥ר <S%H5104><s%> river הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <S%H8145><s%> of the second גִּיח֑וֹן <S%H1521><s%> [is] Gihon ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הַסּוֹבֵ֔ב <S%H5437><s%> the same [is] it that compasseth אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the whole land כּֽוּשׁ׃ <S%H3568><s%> of Ethiopia

וְשֵׁ֨ם <S%H8034><s%> And the name הַנָּהָ֤ר <S%H5104><s%> river הַשְּׁלִישִׁי֙ <S%H7992><s%> of the third חִדֶּ֔קֶל <S%H2313><s%> [is] Hiddekel ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> it הַֽהֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> that [is] it which goeth toward קִדְמַ֣ת <S%H6926><s%> the east אַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria וְהַנָּהָ֥ר <S%H5104><s%> river הָֽרְבִיעִ֖י <S%H7243><s%> And the fourth ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he פְרָֽת׃ <S%H6578><s%> [is] Euphrates

וַיִּקַּ֛ח <S%H3947><s%> took יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> the man וַיַּנִּחֵ֣הוּ <S%H3240><s%> and put him בְגַן־ <S%H1588><s%> into the garden עֵ֔דֶן <S%H5731><s%> of Eden לְעָבְדָ֖הּ <S%H5647><s%> to dress וּלְשָׁמְרָֽהּ׃ <S%H8104><s%> it and to keep

וַיְצַו֙ <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הָֽאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> the man לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying מִכֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> any עֵֽץ־ <S%H6086><s%> Of every tree הַגָּ֖ן <S%H1588><s%> of the garden אָכֹ֥ל <S%H398><s%> thou mayest freely תֹּאכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> eat

וּמֵעֵ֗ץ <S%H6086><s%> But of the tree הַדַּ֙עַת֙ <S%H1847><s%> of the knowledge ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> of good וָרָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> and evil לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹאכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> thou shalt not eat מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> in בְּי֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> of it for in the day אֲכָלְךָ֥ <S%H398><s%> that thou eatest מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> thereof thou shalt surely תָּמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> die

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> God לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not ט֛וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [It is] not good הֱי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> should be הָֽאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> that the man לְבַדּ֑וֹ <S%H905><s%> to be alone אֶֽעֱשֶׂהּ־ <S%H6213><s%> alone I will make לּ֥וֹ עֵ֖זֶר <S%H5828><s%> him an help meet כְּנֶגְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5048><s%> suitable

וַיִּצֶר֩ <S%H3335><s%> formed יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> God מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> Out הָֽאֲדָמָ֗ה <S%H127><s%> And out of the ground כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every חַיַּ֤ת <S%H2416><s%> every beast הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> of the field וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every ע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and every fowl הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the air וַיָּבֵא֙ <S%H935><s%> and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָ֣אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> [them] unto Adam לִרְא֖וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> what he would call ל֑וֹ וְכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> every אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יִקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> called ל֧וֹ הָֽאָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> them and whatsoever Adam נֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> creature חַיָּ֖ה <S%H2416><s%> every living ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> that שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> [was] the name thereof

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> gave הָֽאָדָ֜ם <S%H120><s%> And Adam שֵׁמ֗וֹת <S%H8034><s%> names לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַבְּהֵמָה֙ <S%H929><s%> to all cattle וּלְע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and to the fowl הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the air וּלְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> every חַיַּ֣ת <S%H2416><s%> and to every beast הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field וּלְאָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> but for Adam לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not מָצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> there was not found עֵ֖זֶר <S%H5828><s%> an help meet כְּנֶגְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5048><s%> suitable

וַיַּפֵּל֩ <S%H5307><s%> to fall יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֧ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> God תַּרְדֵּמָ֛ה <S%H8639><s%> a deep sleep עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> the man וַיִּישָׁ֑ן <S%H3462><s%> and he slept וַיִּקַּ֗ח <S%H3947><s%> and he took אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> one מִצַּלְעֹתָ֔יו <S%H6763><s%> of his ribs וַיִּסְגֹּ֥ר <S%H5462><s%> and closed up בָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> the flesh תַּחְתֶּֽנָּה׃ <S%H8478><s%> place

וַיִּבֶן֩ <S%H1129><s%> made יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהִ֧ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> God אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצֵּלָ֛ע <S%H6763><s%> And the rib אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which לָקַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> had taken מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָֽאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> from man לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> he a woman וַיְבִאֶ֖הָ <S%H935><s%> and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָֽאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> her unto the man

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <S%H559><s%> said הָֽאָדָם֒ <S%H120><s%> And Adam זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> This הַפַּ֗עַם <S%H6471><s%> [is] now עֶ֚צֶם <S%H6106><s%> bone מֵֽעֲצָמַ֔י <S%H6106><s%> of my bones וּבָשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> and flesh מִבְּשָׂרִ֑י <S%H1320><s%> of my flesh לְזֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> she יִקָּרֵ֣א <S%H7121><s%> shall be called אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> Woman כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because מֵאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> out of Man לֻֽקֳחָה־ <S%H3947><s%> was taken זֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> because she

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> For כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore יַֽעֲזָב־ <S%H5800><s%> leave אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> shall a man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> his father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> and his mother וְדָבַ֣ק <S%H1692><s%> and shall cleave בְּאִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> unto his wife וְהָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall become לְבָשָׂ֥ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> and they shall be one

וַיִּֽהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> become שְׁנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H8147><s%> And they were both עֲרוּמִּ֔ים <S%H6174><s%> naked הָֽאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> the man וְאִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <S%H802><s%> and his wife וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> and were not יִתְבֹּשָֽׁשׁוּ׃ <S%H954><s%> and were not ashamed
